user_query: I'm planning a trip to Europe with my friends and we want to explore different countries. Can you provide a list of webcams in each country we plan to visit? We would also like to know the categories of these webcams and see the webcam images and locations.

TaskList.description: Determine the list of countries in Europe that the user plans to visit.
For each identified country, search and retrieve a list of available webcams.
Fetch the categories of each webcam obtained in Step 2.
Retrieve the images and locations for each webcam.
